text: Michelia hypolampra is a species of plant in the family Magnoliaceae. It is endemic to China. It is threatened by habitat loss. ==References== * World Conservation Monitoring Centre 1998. Michelia hypolampra. 2006 IUCN Red List of Threatened Species.
